notes: ON 24 MAY 2021, A WOMAN DROVE HER SUV THROUGH A VACCINATION TENT IN MARYVILLE (TENNESSEE) ALLEGEDLY TO PROTEST THE CORONAVIRUS VACCINE. SHE ALMOST HIT HEALTH WORKERS IN THE TENT, BUT NO INJURIES WERE REPORTED. SHE YELLED 'NO VACCINE!' BEFORE LEAVING THE PARKING LOT. POLICE HAVE CHARGED HER WITH SEVEN FELONY COUNTS FOR RECKLESS ENDANGERMENT.

ON 23 SEPTEMBER 2021, AN UNKNOWN INDIVIDUAL FIRED SHOTS INTO THE OFFICES OF TWO DOCTORS IN POCATELLO (IDAHO). IT IS SUSPECTED THE VICTIMS WERE TARGETED BECAUSE DOCTORS ARE VOCAL PROPONENTS OF VACCINATION AMID THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. THERE WERE NO INJURIES.

ON 29 SEPTEMBER 2021, A MAN STABBED HIS BROTHER AND SISTER-IN-LAW IN ELLICOTT CITY (MARYLAND) ALLEGEDLY BECAUSE THE BROTHER, WHO WORKED AS A PHARMACIST, ADMINISTERED CORONAVIRUS VACCINES. THE STABBER ALLEGEDLY CLAIMED THAT THE PHARMACIST WAS 'KILLING PEOPLE WITH THE COVID SHOT.' BOTH VICTIMS DIED. THE STABBER KILLED HIS MOTHER'S FRIEND BEFOREHAND, ALTHOUGH THE MOTIVE IN THIS INSTANCE IN UNCLEAR.

ON 1 AUGUST 2020, POLICE CLASHED WITH A MAN ARMED WITH AN AK-47 IN SLATINGTON (PENNSYLVANIA) THE DAY AFTER HE REPORTEDLY FIRED AT A CLERK IN A BETHLEHEM CIGAR SHOP WHEN THE CLERK ASKED HIM TO WEAR A MASK. THE PERPETRATOR WAS SHOT TWICE BY POLICE OFFICERS IN THE CLASH AND HAS BEEN CHARGED WITH ATTEMPTED HOMICIDE, AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, AND ROBBERY. ONE OFFICER AND THE MAN BOTH SUFFERED NON-LIFE-THREATENING INJURIES.

ON 8 AUGUST 2025, A MAN ARMED WITH FIVE GUNS, SHOT AT THE CENTER FOR DISEASE CONTROL HEADQUARTERS IN ATLANTA (GEORGIA) IN A TARGETED ATTACK. DURING THE ATTACK, THE PERPETRATOR AND POLICE OFFICERS EXCHANGED GUNFIRE. THE PERPETRATOR SHOT A POLICE OFFICER WHO LATER DIED OF HIS INJURIES IN HOSPITAL, AND A SECOND POLICE OFFICER SUFFERED NON-FATAL INJURIES. THE PERPETRATOR DIED AT THE SCENE FROM A SELF-INFLICTED GUN WOUND. NO CIVILIANS WERE KILLED OR INJURED IN THE ATTACK. SEVERAL EXTERIOR WINDOWS OF THE CDC BUILDING WERE DAMAGED BY THE PERPETRATOR'S GUNFIRE. THE PERPETRATOR BELIEVED THAT HE HAD DEVELOPED DEPRESSION FROM THE CORONAVIRUS VACCINE AND HE BLAMED THE CDC FOR HIS ILLNESS. 2 FATALITIES.

ON 25 DECEMBER 2020, A WOMAN HIT A SHERIFF'S DEPUTY WITH THE OFFICER'S BATON IN SAINT LOUIS (MISSOURI) AFTER THE OFFICER ASKED THE WOMAN TO WEAR A MASK AMID THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. THE OFFICER SUFFERED A CONCUSSION FROM THE ATTACK.

ON 14 MARCH 2020, A MAN ATTACKED A 6-YEAR-OLD CHILD, HIS PARENT, AND A SAM'S CLUB EMPLOYEE WHO TRIED TO INTERVENE, WITH A KNIFE IN A SAM'S CLUB IN MIDLAND (TEXAS), BELIEVING THE CUSTOMERS WERE CHINESE THOUGH THEY WERE IN FACT BURMESE. THE MAN YELLED 'GET OUT OF AMERICA!' AS HE ATTACKED THEM. A TEXAS ASSISTANT ATTORNEY LATER STATED THAT THE MAN ATTACKED THE CUSTOMERS BECAUSE OF THEIR RACE AND BECAUSE HE BLAMED THEM FOR THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. THE MAN LATER PLED GUILTY TO THREE FEDERAL HATE CRIMES.

AROUND 3 MARCH 2020 (AS REPORTED), AN UNIDENTIFIED GROUP OF JUVENILES ASSAULTED AN ASIAN COUPLE IN A SUBWAY STATION IN PHILADELPHIA (PENNSYLVANIA) IN A RACIALLY MOTIVATED CRIME AMID THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. VIDEO OF THE INCIDENT SHOWS THAT THE COUPLE WAS ON THE GROUND AND DEFENSELESS WHEN ATTACKED. POLICE ENCOURAGED VICTIMS OR ANY WITNESS PRESENT IN THE INCIDENT TO PRESENT A REPORT.

ON 28 MARCH 2020, THREE 15 YEARS OLD GIRLS WERE CHARGED WITH HATE CRIME ASSAULTS, MENACING, AND HARASSMENT FOR ATTACKING A 51-YEAR-OLD ASIAN WOMAN IN NEW YORK - BRONX (NEW YORK) AND YELLING ANTI-ASIAN COMMENTS DURING THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC.

ON 28 NOVEMBER 2020, EIGHT MEN ATTACKED A BOWLING-ALLEY MANAGER IN GLEN BURNIE (MARYLAND) AFTER THEY WERE ASKED TO WEAR MASKS DUE TO THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. THE MANAGER WAS KNOCKED DOWN TO THE GROUND AND PUNCHED AND KICKED BY SUSPECTS. THE MANAGER WAS TAKEN TO THE HOSPITAL WITH MINOR INJURIES.

ON 17 DECEMBER 2020, SIX PEOPLE CONFRONTED AN ASIAN WOMAN IN NEW YORK - MANHATTAN (NEW YORK) ABOUT NOT WEARING A MASK DURING THE ONGOING CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC AT A SUBWAY STATION. THE GROUP MADE ANTI-ASIAN COMMENTS AND PUNCHED THE VICTIM IN THE FACE MULTIPLE TIMES.

ON 7 MARCH 2021, THREE WOMEN ATTACKED A NEPALI UBER DRIVER IN SAN FRANCISCO (CALIFORNIA) WHEN HE REFUSED TO CONTINUE THEIR RIDE UNTIL ALL OF THE WOMEN WORE THEIR MASKS TO PREVENT THE SPREAD OF THE CORONAVIRUS. THE WOMEN ATTEMPTED TO REMOVE THE DRIVER'S MASK AND TAKE HIS PHONE. AFTER EXITING THE VEHICLE, ONE WOMAN REACHED INTO THE VEHICLE AND DEPLOYED A 'CAUSTIC CHEMICAL.' OFFICERS ARE INVESTIGATING THE INCIDENT AS A HATE CRIME. THIS COMES AMID AN UPTICK IN CRIMES AGAINST ASIANS AND ASIAN AMERICANS DURING THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC.

ON 17 MARCH 2021, A MAN STABBED THE MANAGER OF A JACK IN THE BOX FAST-FOOD RESTAURANT IN LEAGUE CITY (TEXAS) AFTER THE MANAGER REPEATEDLY ASKED THE MAN TO WEAR A MASK AMID THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. POLICE SAID THE MAN BELLIGERENTLY REFUSED TO COOPERATE WITH THE STORE'S POLICY AND ALLEGEDLY RECORDED THE INCIDENT, CLAIMING THAT THE MANAGER WAS REFUSING HIM SERVICE BECAUSE HE WAS HOMELESS. THE MANAGER ESCORTED THE MAN OUT THE DOOR AND WAS THEN ATTACKED BY BEING STABBED THREE TIMES.

ON 24 MAY 2021, A WOMAN PASSENGER PUNCHED A FLIGHT ATTENDANT IN THE FACE SEVERAL TIMES ON A FLIGHT FROM SACRAMENTO (CALIFORNIA) TO SAN DIEGO, LEAVING THE FLIGHT ATTENDANT WITH BLOOD RUNNING DOWN HER FACE. THE ATTACK BROKE OUT WHEN THE FLIGHT ATTENDANT ASKED THE PASSENGER TO FASTEN HER SEATBELT, PULL HER TRAY TABLE DOWN, AND PROPERLY WEAR HER MASK AS A CORONAVIRUS SAFETY MEASURE PROTOCOL. THE FLIGHT ATTENDANT WAS TAKEN TO THE HOSPITAL AND WAS TREATED FOR THREE CHIPPED TEETH, BRUISES ON HER EYE AND FOREARM, AND A CUT UNDER HER EYES. ON 27 MAY 2022, THE PASSENGER WAS SENTENCED TO 15 MONTHS IN FEDERAL PRISON.
ON 11 AUGUST 2021, A PARENT PHYSICALLY ATTACKED A SCHOOL TEACHER IN SUTTER CREEK (CALIFORNIA) OVER CORONAVIRUS MASK RULES FOR STUDENTS. THE TEACHER WAS HOSPITALIZED AND SUSTAINED BRUISES AND CUTS.

ON 16 SEPTEMBER 2021, THREE BLACK WOMEN FROM TEXAS PUNCHED AND SCRATCHED A RESTAURANT HOSTESS ON THE UPPER WEST SIDE IN NEW YORK - MANHATTAN (NEW YORK) AFTER THE HOSTESS ALLEGEDLY USED A RACIAL SLUR AGAINST THEM AND PEOPLE IN THEIR PARTY AND ACCUSED THE PARTY OF USING FAKE VACCINE CARDS. THE HOSTESS WENT TO THE HOSPITAL WITH BRUISES AND SCRATCHES. DAYS LATER, A BLM DEMONSTRATION AGAINST THE EVENT OCCURRED OUTSIDE THE RESTAURANT. THE EVENT WAS ORIGINALLY REPORTED AS A CLASH OVER THE VACCINATION STATUS OF THE WOMEN AMID THE CORONAVIRUS, BUT THE THREE WOMEN WERE ALL VACCINATED AND SEATED INSIDE BEFORE CLASHING WITH THE HOSTESS AFTER TWO MEN FROM THE PARTY DID NOT PROVIDE VACCINE CARDS.

ON 3 NOVEMBER 2021, TWO INDIVIDUALS ATTACKED THE OWNER OF A COOKIE SHOP AT THE CRUMB TOGETHER STORE IN EUGENE (OREGON) DUE TO A DISPUTE OVER CORONAVIRUS MASK MANDATE RULES. THE OWNER HAD ASKED THEM TO LEAVE FOR NOT WEARING MASKS, BUT THE TWO INDIVIDUALS REFUSED, AND PUSHED THE OWNER AFTER SHE TRIED TO MAKE THEM LEAVE. THEN THE OWNER PICKED UP A BASEBALL BAT, WHICH PROMPTED ONE OF THE INDIVIDUALS TO ATTACK HER. THE TWO INDIVIDUALS WERE ARRESTED AFTER SHOWING THE VIDEO TO THE POLICE IN AN EFFORT TO HAVE THE STORE OWNER ARRESTED.

ON 30 DECEMBER 2021, A MAN ATTACKED TWO HEALTHCARE WORKERS BY PUNCHING THEM SEVERAL TIMES EACH AT A CORONAVIRUS VACCINE CLINIC IN TUSTIN (CALIFORNIA). THE ATTACK BEGAN AFTER THE MAN WAS ASKED BY STAFF TO PUT ON A MASK, AFTER WHICH HE PUNCHED ONE WORKER TWICE, AND ANOTHER WORKER FIVE TIMES BEFORE BYSTANDERS PHYSICALLY PINNED HIM DOWN. AT LEAST ONE HEALTHCARE WORKER RECEIVED EMERGENCY MEDICAL TREATMENT FOR INJURIES INCURRED FROM THE ATTACK. WITNESSES SAY THE MAN CALLED THE HEALTHCARE WORKERS 'MURDERERS' AND CLAIMED THAT THEY WERE COMPLICIT IN THE 'HOAX.' POLICE ARRIVED ON THE SCENE AND DEPLOYED THEIR TASERS THREE TIMES AT THE MAN WHILE ATTEMPTING TO SUBDUE AND ARREST HIM. THE PERPETRATOR WAS LATER TREATED FOR MINOR SCRAPES AT THE O.C. GLOBAL MEDICAL CENTER, AND THERE HE ASSAULTED THE NURSE ATTENDING TO HIM BY BENDING HER FINGER BACK AND THEN GROPING HER.

ON 7 MAY 2020, THREE MEN FIRED SHOTS AT POLICE OFFICERS IN LEXINGTON (MISSISSIPPI) WHILE THE OFFICERS WERE ATTEMPTING TO ENFORCE RESTRICTIONS IMPOSED ON SOCIAL GATHERINGS DUE TO THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. ONE OFFICER WAS INJURED, BUT THERE WERE NO FATALITIES. THE THREE MEN WERE LATER ARRESTED.

ON 17 MAY 2020, A MAN ARMED WITH A MACHETE ATTACKED A COUPLE ON THE STREETS IN NASHVILLE (TENNESSEE) WITH THE STATED INTENTION OF DEMONSTRATING HIS ANGER AGAINST LOCAL SHUTDOWNS IMPOSED IN RESPONSE TO THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. TWO PEOPLE WERE INJURED BUT THERE WERE NO FATALITIES.

ON 31 JULY 2020, A MAN FIRED TWO SHOTS AT A CLERK AND ONE SHOT INTO THE AIR OUTSIDE A CIGAR SHOP IN BETHLEHEM (PENNSYLVANIA) AFTER HE WAS ASKED TO WEAR A MASK IN THE SHOP AMID STATE-WIDE RESTRICTIONS IMPOSED DUE TO THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. NO ONE WAS INJURED IN THE INCIDENT. AS THE PERPETRATOR WAS CONFRONTED THE NEXT DAY, HE REPORTEDLY FIRED AT THE POLICE WITH AN AK-47. HE WAS SHOT TWICE BY POLICE OFFICERS AND HAS BEEN CHARGED WITH ATTEMPTED HOMICIDE, AGGRAVATED ASSAULT AND ROBBERY. HE SUFFERED NON-LIFE-THREATENING INJURIES.

ON 25 OCTOBER 2020, TWO WOMEN ALLEGEDLY STABBED A SECURITY GUARD 27 TIMES AT A STORE IN CHICAGO (ILLINOIS) AFTER HE ASKED THE TWO WOMEN TO LEAVE THE STORE FOR REFUSING TO WEAR MASKS DUE TO THE ONGOING CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC WHILE SHOPPING. THE TWO WOMEN WERE ARRESTED, AND THE SECURITY GUARD WAS TAKEN TO A HOSPITAL FOR HIS INJURIES.

ON 31 OCTOBER 2020, THREE MEN FIRED 15 ROUNDS FROM AN AK-47 OUTSIDE OF THE SAHARA THEATER STRIP CLUB IN ANAHEIM (CALIFORNIA) AFTER THEY WERE REFUSED ENTRY FOR NOT WEARING MASKS AMID THE STATE'S CORONAVIRUS RESTRICTIONS. THREE PEOPLE SUFFERED MINOR TO MODERATE INJURIES. A FOURTH CIVILIAN WAS WOUNDED BUT ALLEGEDLY REFUSED MEDICAL ATTENTION. NONE OF THE INJURIES WERE LIFE-THREATENING.

ON 14 JUNE 2021, A MAN SHOT AND KILLED A CASHIER AT A GROCERY STORE IN DECATUR (GEORGIA) AFTER THE EMPLOYEE ASKED HIM TO WEAR A FACE MASK TO PREVENT THE SPREAD OF THE CORONAVIRUS. WHEN THE SHERIFF'S DEPUTY, WHO WAS PROVIDING SECURITY AT THE STORE, ATTEMPTED TO INTERVENE, THE SHOOTER ALSO SHOT AND WOUNDED HIM. THE SHOOTER WAS ALSO INJURED AND ARRESTED AFTER ATTEMPTING 'TO CRAWL OUT OF THE FRONT DOOR OF THE SUPERMARKET.' THE CASHIER WAS TAKEN TO HOSPITAL BUT WAS LATER PRONOUNCED DEAD. THE SHOOTER AND THE OFFICER REMAIN IN STABLE CONDITION.

ON 17 AUGUST 2021, AN INDIVIDUAL PHYSICALLY AND VERBALLY ASSAULTED AN ASIAN AMERICAN STUDENT IN CINCINNATI (OHIO) DUE TO THE STUDENT'S RACE. THE PERPETRATOR TOLD THE VICTIM 'GO BACK TO YOUR COUNTRY...YOU BROUGHT KUNG FLU HERE...YOU'RE GOING TO DIE FOR BRINGING IT.' AND PUNCHED THE VICTIM SEVERAL TIMES IN THE HEAD. THE VICTIM SUFFERED ORBITAL CONTUSION, FACIAL LACERATIONS, AND AN ACUTE HEAD INJURY. THE PERPETRATOR CONTINUED PUNCHING THE VICTIM UNTIL THE VICTIM WAS BLEEDING ON THE GROUND AND TWO BYSTANDERS RESTRAINED HIM. THE PERPETRATOR WAS ARRESTED AND CHARGED WITH MISDEMEANOR ASSAULT AND CRIMINAL INTIMIDATION.

ON 22 JANUARY 2022, A WOMAN ATTACKED A FEMALE EMPLOYEE AT THE 7-11 IN THE MCCULLY SHOPPING CENTER IN HONOLULU (HAWAII) AFTER SHE WAS ASKED TO PUT ON A FACE MASK, PER THE STATEWIDE CORONAVIRUS PUBLIC HEALTH PROTOCOLS. ACCORDING TO POLICE, THE VICTIM WAS HOSPITALIZED FOR 'SUBSTANTIAL BODILY INJURIES.'

ON 15 OCTOBER 2023, A 26-YEAR-OLD MAN PUNCHED A 19-YEAR-OLD SIKH MAN SEVERAL TIMES IN THE FACE AND TRIED TO REMOVE HIS TURBAN AND MEDICAL MASK ON A SHUTTLE BUS IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD OF SOUTH RICHMOND HILL IN NEW YORK - QUEENS (NEW YORK). THE CONFRONTATION BEGAN WHEN THE PERPETRATOR YELLED AT THE SIKH MAN TO TAKE OFF HIS (CORONAVIRUS) MEDICAL MASK. DURING THE ATTACK, THE PERPETRATOR YELLED 'WE DON'T WEAR THAT IN THIS COUNTRY AND TAKE THAT MASK OFF' AT THE VICTIM. THE PERPETRATOR EXITED THE SHUTTLE BUS AFTER PUNCHING THE VICTIM AND THEN RE-ENTERED THE BUS TO PUNCH HIM AGAIN. THE VICTIM SUFFERED FACIAL SWELLING, BRUISES, AND A BLOODY NOSE. THE PERPETRATOR WAS CHARGED WITH A FELONY HATE CRIME, THIRD DEGREE ASSAULT, AND AGGRAVATED HARASSMENT ON OCTOBER 20.

ON 27 AUGUST 2021, A GROUP OF PEOPLE GATHERED ON THE CAMPUS OF PENN STATE IN STATE COLLEGE (PENNSYLVANIA) TO DEMONSTRATE IN FAVOR OF A VACCINE MANDATE ON CAMPUS, IN ORDER TO PREVENT THE SPREAD OF THE CORONAVIRUS PANDEMIC. DEMONSTRATORS WERE COUNTER-DEMONSTRATED BY A GROUP RALLYING AGAINST A VACCINE MANDATE. ONE ANTI-VACCINE MANDATE DEMONSTRATOR WAS ASSAULTED BY A MAN WHO WAS LATER IDENTIFIED AS A PROFESSOR - HE WAS INJURED IN HIS HEAD AND FACE BY THE PROFESSOR AND WAS VISIBLY BLOODIED. THE PROFESSOR WAS LATER ARRESTED.

source: KNX 1070 NEWSRADIO; LOS ANGELES TIMES; MY NEWS LA

A MAN DROVE HIS VEHICLE INTO THE CROWD HOSPITALIZING ONE WOMAN WITH NON-LIFE-THREATENING INJURIES. THE PERPETRATOR WAS ARRESTED. A WITNESS CLAIMED THAT THE DRIVER 'DISAGREED WITH THE PROTEST' BEFORE ENTERING HIS SUV AND 'INTENTIONALLY' DRIVING TOWARDS DEMONSTRATORS.

source: BOSTON 25; FNTV; NEW YORK POST; NEWSWEEK
notes: ON 28 NOVEMBER 2022, SOME 200 PROTESTERS, INCLUDING CHINESE AMERICANS AND STUDENTS, GATHERED AT COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY LOW LIBRARY IN NEW YORK - MANHATTAN (NEW YORK) IN SOLIDARITY WITH ANTI-LOCKDOWN DEMONSTRATIONS IN CHINA. PROTESTERS ALSO HELD A VIGIL FOR THE TEN PEOPLE KILLED IN AN APARTMENT FIRE IN URUMQI, CHINA. DURING THE DEMONSTRATION, A MAN APPROACHED A 21-YEAR-OLD WOMAN WHO WAS PROTESTING IN SOLIDARITY WITH ANTI-LOCKDOWN DEMONSTRATIONS IN CHINA, REPEATEDLY PUNCHED HER IN THE HEAD AND RENDERED HER UNCONSCIOUS IN AN UNPROVOKED ATTACK. THE VICTIM WAS TAKEN TO THE HOSPITAL.

ON 8 AUGUST 2021, TWO MEN AND ONE WOMAN ATTACKED A HOMELESS ENCAMPMENT AT CHAPMAN SQUARE IN PORTLAND - DOWNTOWN (OREGON). THE THREE INDIVIDUALS ATTACKED SEVERAL RESIDENTS OF THE ENCAMPMENT, INCLUDING SOME WHO ARE BLACK. WITNESSES ALLEGE THE ATTACKERS WERE INEBRIATED AND USED RACIAL SLURS. ONE VICTIM SUFFERED A SEVERE HEAD INJURY AND WAS HOSPITALIZED. THE ATTACKERS LEFT AFTER A RESIDENT USED BEAR MACE AGAINST THEM.

ON 3 APRIL 2023, A MAN DROVE HIS CAR INTO A SMALL GROUP OF PEOPLE INCLUDING VOLUNTEERS FROM RENO FOOD NOT BOMBS WHO WERE HOSTING A MEAL NEAR THE NEVADA CARES CAMPUS IN RENO (NEVADA), LEADING TWO VOLUNTEERS TO BE CRITICALLY INJURED. ONE UNHOUSED PERSON WAS ALSO CRITICALLY INJURED AND LATER DIED IN THE HOSPITAL. THE PERPETRATOR WAS LATER CAUGHT AND CLAIMED THAT THE ATTACK WAS 'INTENTIONAL.' AN INITIAL POLICE REPORT CLAIMED THAT THOSE STRUCK WERE NOT TARGETED AS INDIVIDUALS, BUT FOR 'WHY THEY WERE IN THE AREA.' THE DRIVER FACES TWO CHARGES OF ATTEMPTED MURDER AND ONE CHARGE OF MURDER.

ON 26 NOVEMBER 2023, AN ARMED INDIVIDUAL SHOT AND KILLED A 37-YEAR-OLD HOMELESS MAN AT THE INTERSECTION OF 110TH STREET AND VERMONT AVENUE IN LOS ANGELES - SOUTH (CALIFORNIA) IN AN UNPROVOKED ATTACK. THE POLICE BELIEVE THAT THE PERPETRATOR WAS TARGETING UNHOUSED INDIVIDUALS. THE PERPETRATOR ALSO SHOT AND KILLED 2 OTHER UNHOUSED INDIVIDUALS LATER THE SAME WEEK (CODED SEPARATELY). 1 FATALITY.

ON 27 NOVEMBER 2023, AN ARMED INDIVIDUAL SHOT AND KILLED A 62-YEAR-OLD HOMELESS MAN NEAR 600 MATEO STREET IN LOS ANGELES - CENTRAL (CALIFORNIA) IN AN UNPROVOKED ATTACK. THE POLICE BELIEVE THAT THE PERPETRATOR WAS TARGETING UNHOUSED INDIVIDUALS. THE PERPETRATOR ALSO SHOT AND KILLED 2 OTHER UNHOUSED INDIVIDUALS IN THE SAME WEEK (CODED SEPARATELY). 1 FATALITY.

ON 29 NOVEMBER 2023, AN ARMED INDIVIDUAL SHOT AND KILLED A 52-YEAR-OLD HOMELESS MAN AVENUE 18 AND PASADENA AVENUE IN LOS ANGELES - EASTSIDE (CALIFORNIA) IN AN UNPROVOKED ATTACK. THE POLICE BELIEVE THAT THE PERPETRATOR WAS TARGETING UNHOUSED INDIVIDUALS. THE PERPETRATOR ALSO SHOT AND KILLED 2 OTHER UNHOUSED INDIVIDUALS IN THE SAME WEEK (CODED SEPARATELY). 1 FATALITY.

MEMBERS OF GUARDIAN ANGELS ALSO CLAIM THAT THE VICTIM WAS SHOPLIFTING BEFORE THE INCIDENT AND THAT MEMBERS PERFORMED A 'CITIZEN'S ARREST.' THE VICTIM WAS A NEW YORK NATIVE AND WAS NOT SHOPLIFTING. THE POLICE ISSUED THE VICTIM A TICKET FOR DISORDERLY CONDUCT.

ON 17 JUNE 2024, A MAN USED ANTI-MUSLIM RHETORIC AND RAMMED HIS CAR INTO ANOTHER VEHICLE HOLDING FOR MULIM MEN HEADING TO A MOSQUE IN HUNTINGTON (NEW YORK). WHEN THE PERPETRATOR STOPPED HIS VEHICLE AT A RED LIGHT, A CAR WITH FOUR MEN WEARING 'TRADITIONAL MUSLIM ATTIRE' STOPPED NEXT TO HIS CAR. THE MAN THEN CLAIMED THAT THE MEN 'DIDN'T BELONG' AND THAT ALL MUSLIMS 'SHOULD DIE' AND DROVE HIS VEHICLE INTO THE SIDE OF THE OTHER CAR, DAMAGING IT.

notes: ON 7 JULY 2025, A GUNMAN ARMED WITH A RIFLE OPENED FIRE AT BORDER PATROL AGENTS OUTSIDE THE RIO GRANDE VALLEY BORDER PATROL SECTOR ANNEX BUILDING IN MCALLEN (TEXAS), FIRING 30 TO 60 ROUNDS. THE GUNMAN WAS SHOT AND KILLED BY THE AGENTS. A MCALLEN POLICE OFFICER, A BORDER PATROL AGENT, AND A U.S. CUSTOMS AND BORDER PROTECTION EMPLOYEE WERE INJURED BY THE ATTACK AND TAKEN TO THE HOSPITAL WITH NON-LIFE THREATENING INJURIES. notes: ON 1 SEPTEMBER 2024, A MAN WALKED INTO A PARK RANGER'S SECURITY BOOTH, LAID ON THE GROUND, AND THEN STABBED A PARK RANGER MULTIPLE TIMES IN THE HEAD AND FACE WHEN THE PARK RANGER TRIED TO GET HIM TO LEAVE THE BOOTH IN PHILADELPHIA (PENNSYLVANIA). THE MAN YELLED, 'GO BACK TO YOUR COUNTRY, YOU IMMIGRANT.' POLICE CHARGED THE MAN WITH ATTEMPTED MURDER, AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, ETHNIC INTIMIDATION, TERRORISTIC THREATS, AND RELATED OFFENSES. DURING THE ATTACK, THE PARK RANGER WAS ABLE TO HANDCUFF THE PERPETRATOR. THE PARK RANGER WAS HOSPITALIZED WITH NON-LIFETHREATENING INJURIES, INCLUDING SEVERAL STAB WOUNDS TO THE FACE AND HEAD.

notes: ON 21 JULY 2024, A SEASONAL PARKS DEPARTMENT EMPLOYEE CAME TO THE LOCATION WHERE A 30-YEAR-OLD VENEZUELAN HOMELESS MAN WAS STAYING AND FATALLY SHOT HIM IN THE CHEST IN A CLINTON HILL PARK IN NEW YORK - BROOKLYN (NEW YORK). THE ATTACKER WAS IN VERBAL ALTERCATION WITH A GROUP OF MIGRANTS, INCLUDING THE VICTIM, IN THE SAME LOCATION THREE DAYS PRIOR WHILE THE PERPETRATOR TRIED TO CLEAR THE HOMELESS ENCAMPMENT IN THE PARK AS PART OF HIS WORK DUTIES. THE DA STATED THAT THE INCIDENT WAS PREMEDITATED, THAT THE PERPETRATOR WAS MOTIVATED BY HIS 'HATE FOR MIGRANTS', AND CHARGED THE PERPETRATOR WITH SECOND-DEGREE MURDER AS A HATE CRIME. 1 FATALITY.

ON 4 APRIL 2025, A 30-YEAR-OLD MAN INTENTIONALLY DROVE HIS CAR INTO A YARD WHERE A BARBECUE WAS HELD, USED AN ETHNIC SLUR, AND SAID 'GO BACK TO YOUR COUNTRY' IN NEW YORK - STATEN ISLAND (NEW YORK). THE PERPETRATOR HIT AT LEAST ONE PERSON, CAUSING BLUNT FORCE TRAUMA TO THE BACK, SHOULDER, LEG, HAND, AND WRIST. THE VICTIM WAS TAKEN TO RICHMOND UNIVERSITY MEDICAL CENTER. THE PERPETRATOR WAS INDICTED FOR MULTIPLE HATE CRIMES.

ON 4 OCTOBER 2020, A GROUP OF WHITE MEN ASSAULTED TWO HISPANIC MEN AT A BAR IN FRANKLIN (TENNESSEE) FOR SPEAKING SPANISH, TELLING THEM 'SPEAK FUCKING ENGLISH, YOU'RE IN AMERICA'. ONE OF THE MEN SUFFERED A CONCUSSION AND A BROKEN NOSE, WITH AN EYE SOCKET NEEDING SEVERAL SURGERIES TO REPAIR. ONE OF THE VICTIM IS A TRUMPET PLAYER FOR THE GRAMMY-WINNING US COUNTRY BAND THE MAVERICKS.

ON 1 MAY 2021, A GROUP OF TEENAGERS HURLED INSULTS AT AND BEAT AN ASIAN TEENAGE BOY IN NEW YORK - QUEENS (NEW YORK) DURING WHICH ONE OF THE ATTACKERS USED RACIAL SLURS, SAYING 'STUPID F----G CHINESE. GO BACK TO YOUR COUNTRY.' THE ASIAN TEENAGER WAS HOSPITALIZED BUT IS IN STABLE CONDITION. NO ARRESTS HAVE BEEN MADE AND NYPD'S HATE CRIMES TASK FORCE IS INVESTIGATING THE INCIDENT.

source: BORDER REPORT; NEW YORK TIMES; TEXAS TRIBUNE
notes: ON 27 SEPTEMBER 2022, TWO MEN SHOT AT A GROUP OF AROUND 13 MIGRANTS AROUND 4 MILES SOUTH OF SIERRA BLANCA (TEXAS), KILLING A MAN AND INJURING A WOMAN. ACCORDING TO THE MIGRANTS, THE MEN DROVE UP TO THE GROUP, WHICH WAS HIDING IN THE BRUSH, CALLED OUT TO THE GROUP IN SPANISH, REVVED THE ENGINE OF THEIR TRUCK, AND THEN FIRED TWO ROUNDS AT THE GROUP AFTER THE MIGRANTS LEFT THE BRUSH BEFORE DRIVING AWAY. ONE OF THE TWO MEN WAS THE WARDEN AT THE WEST TEXAS DETENTION CENTER (WTDC), WHICH HAS BEEN THE SUBJECT OF SEVERAL ALLEGATIONS OF VIOLENCE AGAINST IMMIGRANTS. THE TWO MEN CLAIMED THAT THEY BELIEVED THEY WERE SHOOTING AT A JAVELINA, NOT A GROUP OF MIGRANTS, AND WERE CHARGED WITH MANSLAUGHTER.

ON 10 SEPTEMBER 2023, A RESTAURANT OWNER HIT TWO MEN WITH HIS CAR ON HALL STREET IN CLINTON HILL IN NEW YORK - BROOKLYN (NEW YORK) IN AN UNPROVOKED ATTACK. POLICE SAID THE MAN SHARED A PHOTO OF A NAZI GERMAN SOLDIER GETTING MARRIED ALONG WITH THE MESSAGE 'TODAY SEEMS LIKE A GOOD DAY TO DIE' ON 4CHAN HOURS BEFORE HE BEGAN HIS ATTACK.

ON 19 JULY 2022, TEN MEMBERS OF THE BLACK HAMMER PARTY KIDNAPPED AND FORCED TWO MEN INSIDE A PADLOCK LOCKED GARAGE AT GUNPOINT AND FORBADE THEM TO LEAVE IN FAYETTEVILLE (GEORGIA). ONE OF THE MEN WAS THEN SODOMIZED BY THE LEADER OF THE GROUP. ONE OF THE BLACK HAMMER PARTY MEMBERS DIED AT THE SCENE FROM A 'SELF-INFLICTED GUNSHOT WOUND' BEFORE POLICE RAIDED. THE MOTIVE FOR THE KIDNAPPING IS UNKNOWN. THE INVESTIGATION IS ONGOING.

ON 25 JULY 2022, A MAN SHOT AT AN AFRICAN AMERICAN MAN IN WARREN (MICHIGAN). THE SHOOTER POINTED A GREEN LASER AT THE VICTIM'S CHEST WHO WAS WALKING DOWN THE STREET AND YELLED 'N***** YOU BETTER GET MOVING!' BEFORE FIRING THREE SHOTS AT THE VICTIM. THE SHOTS DID NOT HIT THE VICTIM AND NO INJURIES WERE REPORTED. POLICE ARRESTED THE PERPETRATOR AND FOUND OTHER WEAPONS INCLUDING PISTOLS, SHOTGUNS, AR-15-STYLE RIFLES, HIGH-CAPACITY MAGAZINES, AN M203 GRENADE SHELL, AND NAZI MEMORABILIA.

notes: ON 6 MAY 2023, A 33-YEAR OLD DRESSED IN A BLACK TACTICAL VEST SHOT INTO A CROWD WITH AN AR-15 AT THE ALLEN PREMIUM OUTLETS MALL IN ALLEN (TEXAS). HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE EVACUATED THE MALL. OFFICERS RESPONDING TO A NEARBY UNRELATED CALL LATER ARRIVED AND FATALLY SHOT THE GUNMAN. INCLUDING THE SHOOTER, 9 PEOPLE WERE KILLED, WITH 7 PEOPLE BEING PRONOUNCED DEAD AT THE SCENE AND 2 OTHERS LATER DYING AT THE HOSPITAL. AT LEAST 7 PEOPLE WERE ALSO INJURED. ADDITIONALLY, THE MAN HAD SWASTIKA TATTOOS, A PUNISHER TATTOO, AND A 'DEUS VULT' CHRISTIAN TATTOO. ADDITIONALLY, HE WORE A PATCH WITH THE PHRASE 'RWDS' (RIGHT WING DEATH SQUAD) AS HE CARRIED OUT THE ATTACK. THIS JOURNAL ALSO FOCUSED ON MENTAL HEALTH ISSUES AND THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN HIS LATINO BACKGROUND AND HIS WHITE SUPREMACIST BELIEFS. notes: ON 3 JULY 2023, A MAN SHOT AND KILLED FIVE PEOPLE AND INJURED FOUR IN PHILADELPHIA (PENNSYLVANIA) IN WHAT AUTHORITIES DESCRIBED AS A 'RANDOM, PREMEDITATED, [AND] DELIBERATE' ATTACK. THE MAN IS BELIEVED TO HAVE SHOT AND KILLED ONE OF THE VICTIMS IN THE VICTIM'S HOME A FEW DAYS BEFORE CARRYING OUT THE REST OF THE ATTACK, THOUGH THIS WAS ONLY DISCOVERED AFTER THE ATTACK HAD TAKEN PLACE. THE ATTACK BEGAN WHEN THE MAN BEGAN FIRING AT PEOPLE ON THE STREET. THE MAN THEN FIRED AT OFFICERS WHO ARRIVED ON THE SCENE BEFORE BEING CHASED INTO AN ALLEY AND ARRESTED. HE HAD IN HIS POSSESSION AN 'AR-STYLE' RIFLE, HANDGUN, AND AN EMERGENCY RADIO SCANNER, AND HE WORE A BULLETPROOF VEST AND SKI MASK. BOTH OF THE GUNS WERE 'GHOST GUNS.' OFFICERS SAID THAT THE PERPETRATOR TOLD THEM THAT HE CARRIED OUT THE SHOOTING TO 'CLEAN UP THE NEIGHBORHOOD.' THE PERPETRATOR WAS SAID TO HAVE BEEN GETTING MORE AGITATED AND 'EXHIBITING ABNORMAL BEHAVIOR' BEFORE THE SHOOTING. HE HAD MADE SOCIAL MEDIA POSTS PRAISING CONSERVATIVE MEDIA FIGURES AND, MORE RECENTLY, EXPRESSING 'BELIEF IN DARK SPIRITUAL FORCES AT WORK,' PRO-SECOND AMENDMENT SENTIMENTS, AND DESCRIPTIONS OF PERFORMING 'PATROLS' IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD. THE PERPETRATOR HAD POSTED PHOTOS ON SOCIAL MEDIA OF HIM DRESSED IN WOMEN'S CLOTHES WHICH LED TO SPECULATION ONLINE THAT HE WAS TRANSGENDER, THOUGH POLICE CLARIFIED THAT HE IDENTIFIES AS MALE.

ON 20 NOVEMBER 2023, AN ARMED MAN ENTERED A WALMART IN BEAVERCREEK (OHIO) AND SHOT FOUR PEOPLE WHO WERE SHOPPING BEFORE FATALLY SHOOTING HIMSELF. THE VICTIMS AND THE PERPETRATOR WERE NOT KNOWN TO EACH OTHER. 4 PEOPLE WERE INJURED AND HOSPITALIZED. THE FBI SUSPECT THAT THE ATTACK WAS AT LEAST PARTIALLY RACIALLY MOTIVATED, BASED ON JOURNAL WRITINGS OF THE PERPETRATOR. TWO OF THE VICTIMS WERE BLACK, WHILE TWO WERE WHITE. THE SHOOTER ALSO HAD TWO NAZI FLAGS AT HIS HOME. 1 FATALITY.

ON 1 JANUARY 2025, A PICKUP TRUCK DRIVER BYPASSED A POLICE BLOCKADE AND DROVE INTO A CROWD IN NEW ORLEANS (LOUISIANA) WHERE PEOPLE WERE GATHERED TO CELEBRATE THE NEW YEAR. THE ATTACK RESULTED IN 14 FATALITIES AND LEFT AROUND 30 PEOPLE INJURED. THE SUSPECT WAS KILLED DURING AN EXCHANGE OF GUNFIRE WITH POLICE, WHICH ALSO LEFT TWO OFFICERS INJURED. THE DRIVER ALSO PLACED TWO HOMEMADE IMPROVISED EXPLOSIVE DEVICES THAT DID NOT DETONATE IN THE FRENCH QUARTER. SURVEILLANCE FOOTAGE INITIALLY CAPTURED THREE MEN AND A WOMAN BELIEVED TO BE ACTING ALONGSIDE THE DRIVER BUT THEY WERE LATER DETERMINED TO BE INNOCENT BYSTANDERS UNCONNECTED TO THE INCIDENT. THE DRIVER, IDENTIFIED AS A 42-YEAR-OLD U.S. CITIZEN AND ARMY VETERAN FROM TEXAS, WAS FOUND WITH A FLAG ASSOCIATED WITH THE ISLAMIC STATE GROUP ON THE VEHICLE'S TRAILER HITCH. ON HIS SOCIAL MEDIA, THE PERPETRATOR CLAIMS TO HAVE JOINED ISIS AND WAS MOTIVATED BY RELIGIOUS TENSIONS. 14 FATALITIES.

AFTER THE DEMONSTRATION, NSC MEMBERS FOLLOWED ONE EVENT ORGANIZER BY CAR, THEN PHYSICALLY CONFRONTED HIM OUTSIDE AN APARTMENT BUILDING, BREAKING HIS DRIVER'S SIDE WINDOW AS HE SAT INSIDE.

ON 6 MAY 2022, A PERPETRATOR ASKED A HASIDIC MAN 'WHAT ARE YOU LOOKING AT,' THEN PUNCHED HIM IN THE FACE AND HEAD, AND SAID 'NAZIS SHOULD HAVE KILLED YOU JEWS' ON PRESIDENT STREET BETWEEN UTICA AVENUE AND SCHENECTADY AVENUE IN NEW YORK - BROOKLYN (NEW YORK) IN WHAT POLICE SAY WAS AN UNPROVOKED ATTACK THAT THEY ARE INVESTIGATING AS A HATE CRIME. THE VICTIM WAS HOSPITALIZED.

ON 14 DECEMBER 2022, A PERPETRATOR FOLLOWED A 63-YEAR-OLD VICTIM, HIT HIM FROM BEHIND AND MADE ANTISEMITIC COMMENTS, AS WELL AS SAID 'KANYE 2024' NEAR THE INTERSECTION OF TERRACE DRIVE AND EAST DRIVE IN CENTRAL PARK IN NEW YORK - MANHATTAN (NEW YORK) IN AN UNPROVOKED ATTACK. THE VICTIM SUFFERED A CHIPPED TOOTH AND A BROKEN HAND.

ON 25 JANUARY 2023, AN UNREPORTED NUMBER OF MEN ATTACKED A JEWISH MAN IN A GIANT SUPERMARKET IN GAITHERSBURG (MARYLAND). ACCORDING TO THE VICTIM, THE GROUP OF MEN ATTACKED HIM WHEN HE ASKED THEM TO STOP HARASSING CUSTOMERS. THE VICTIM SAYS HE UNZIPPED HIS SWEATSHIRT WHICH MADE VISIBLE A STAR OF DAVID NECKLACE THAT HE WAS WEARING. ONE OF THE MEN IN THE GROUP RESPONDED TO THE SIGHT BY SAYING 'LET'S GO FUCKING JEW' AND BEGAN PUNCHING THE VICTIM. THE OTHER MEN IN THE GROUP ALLEGEDLY SHOUTED 'YEAH, DO IT FOR KANYE' WHILE THE VICTIM WAS BEING ATTACKED. THE PERPETRATOR SLAMMED THE VICTIM'S HEAD ON THE GROUND MULTIPLE TIMES WHICH CAUSED HIM TO LOSE CONSCIOUSNESS. THE PERPETRATORS ALSO STOLE THE VICTIM'S KEYS. THEY WERE LOCATED AT A MCDONALDS NEAR THE SUPERMARKET AFTER THE ASSAULT, AND ONE OF THE ATTACKERS WAS ARRESTED. THE DETAINED ATTACKER IS BEING CHARGED WITH ASSAULT, ROBBERY, AND MISIDENTIFYING HIMSELF TO OFFICERS.

ON 28 MAY 2023, A MAN PUNCHED STAFF, INCLUDING A SECURITY GUARD, AT THE ACROPOLIS STEAKHOUSE-STRIP CLUB IN PORTLAND (OREGON) AFTER THE SECURITY GUARD ASKED HIM TO LEAVE BECAUSE HE HAD SHOUTED ANTISEMITIC AND RACIST SLURS. PROSECUTORS HAVE ALLEGED THAT THAT THE SECURITY GUARD WAS TARGETED DUE TO HIM BEING JEWISH. DURING THE ATTACK, THE MAN SHOUTED RACIAL SLURS, ANTISEMITIC EPITHETS, AND 'WHITE POWER.' THE MAN HAS SINCE BEEN ARRAIGNED AND FACES CHARGES INCLUDING ASSAULT, CRIMINAL MISCHIEF, AND A BIAS CRIME.

notes: ON 8 SEPTEMBER 2023, 6 CLOCKWORK CREW AFFILIATES (LOOSELY ASSOCIATED WITH THE RISE ABOVE MOVEMENT) WERE WALKING THROUGH DOWNTOWN VENTURA (CALIFORNIA) WEARING MATCHING UNIFORMS AND CHANTING WHITE SUPREMACIST SLOGANS. A FIGHT BROKE OUT BETWEEN THE TWO GROUPS, RESULTING IN ONE OF THE CLOCKWORK CREW AFFILIATES SUSTAINING AN INJURY TO HIS FACE AND ONE MEMBER OF THE OPPOSING GROUP WHO SUSTAINED AN UNSPECIFIED INJURY. POLICE WERE CALLED BUT NO ARRESTS WERE MADE, AS POLICE CLAIMED THAT BOTH GROUPS DECLINED TO PRESS CHARGES.

ON 17 DECEMBER 2023, A MAN SPRAYED A GASEOUS SUBSTANCE ON MEMBERS OF THE JEWISH COMMUNITY AND YELLED 'GAS THE JEWS' WHILE THEY WERE LEAVING KESHER ISRAEL SYNAGOGUE IN WASHINGTON DC - NORTHWEST (DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA). THE SYNAGOGUE WAS BEING EVACUATED AFTER RECEIVING AN UNRELATED EMAILED BOMB THREAT. THE GAS WAS LATER IDENTIFIED AS FART SPRAY. THE MAN WAS ARRESTED AND CHARGED WITH SIMPLE ASSAULT, RESISTING ARREST, AND A HATE CRIME.

ON 22 JUNE 2024, EIGHT PEOPLE, INCLUDING AT LEAST FIVE ARYAN BROTHERHOOD OF TEXAS AFFILIATES, SHOVED, PUNCHED, AND SUBMERGED TWO PEOPLE'S HEADS UNDERWATER IN MARTINDALE (TEXAS) DURING A FIGHT WITH A FAMILY AT THE SAN MARCOS RIVER. A FIGHT STARTED AFTER AN ARYAN BROTHERHOOD MEMBER CALLED A MEMBER OF THE FAMILY, WHICH IS MIXED RACE, 'TARZAN' AFTER HE SWUNG ON A ROPE SWING. AN AFFILIATE YELLED ' WHITE POWER' DURING THE FIGHT. ONE VICTIM SUFFERED A CONCUSSION, FACIAL SWELLING, AND A BRUISED RETINA, RESULTING IN PARTIAL VISION LOSS, WHILE ANOTHER HAD A BRUISED EYE. POLICE ARRESTED AN AFFILIATE, AND HE HAS CHARGES OF A MISDEMEANOR FOR ASSAULT CAUSING BODILY INJURY.

notes: ON 9 DECEMBER 2020, PEOPLE GATHERED IN A BLOCKADE ZONE OF A NEIGHBORHOOD SURROUNDING THE 'RED HOUSE,' A PRIVATE RESIDENCE PREVIOUSLY OWNED BY A BLACK AND INDIGENOUS FAMILY BEFORE THEIR FORCED EVICTION IN SEPTEMBER, IN PORTLAND - NORTH (OREGON) AGAINST GENTRIFICATION AND THE EVICTION OF THE BLACK AND INDIGENOUS FAMILY. DEMONSTRATORS ERECTED BARRIERS TO BLOCK SEVERAL STREETS OF THE NEIGHBORHOOD FROM VEHICLES. IN THE EVENING, TWO VEHICLES DRIVEN BY ALLEGED FAR-RIGHT ACTIVISTS DROVE PAST THE BLOCKADE AND THREW TWO SMOKE BOMBS AND 'SOME SORT OF IED' AT THE ENTRANCE OF THE BARRICADES. NO ONE WAS INJURED. PORTLAND POLICE CHIEF STATED IN A PRESS CONFERENCE THAT DEMONSTRATORS AT THE CAMP AND BLOCKADE HAVE BEEN STOCKPILING WEAPONS AND HAVE ARMED SENTRIES PROVIDING SECURITY.

ON 19 NOVEMBER 2022, A GROUP OF PEOPLE, INCLUDING MEMBERS OF THE ANTI-FASCIST GROUP ONE PEOPLE'S PROJECT (OPP), GATHERED FOR A DEMONSTRATION AT MONTGOMERY BELL STATE PARK IN BURNS (TENNESSEE) DURING THE AMERICAN RENAISSANCE CONFERENCE, WHICH IS HOSTED BY A WHITE SUPREMACIST FIGURE, TO DEMONSTRATE AGAINST THE CONFERENCE. EIGHT PROUD BOYS, INCLUDING AT LEAST 2 OF WHOM WERE ARMED, GATHERED FOR A COUNTER-DEMONSTRATION. MEMBERS OF THE PROUD BOYS SPIT ON AND PHYSICALLY ATTACKED DEMONSTRATORS. ONE PROUD BOY STRUCK A DEMONSTRATOR ON THE HEAD WITH A BATON AND ANOTHER SLAPPED THE SAME DEMONSTRATOR. THE MAN SUFFERED HEAD INJURIES AND LATER REQUIRED MEDICAL ATTENTION. POLICE ARRIVED AFTER THE INCIDENT BUT MADE NO ARRESTS.

notes: ON 11 JANUARY 2023, A 56-YEAR-OLD WOMAN STABBED AN 18-YEAR-OLD ASIAN WOMAN MULTIPLE TIMES IN THE HEAD ON A BUS AT THE B-LINE PEDESTRIAN TRAIL ON WEST FOURTH STREET IN BLOOMINGTON (INDIANA), LEADING THE VICTIM TO SUFFER BLOODY HEAD INJURIES. THE PERPETRATOR WAS ARRESTED AFTER SHE LEFT THE BUS AND DISCARDED THE KNIFE. WHEN QUESTIONED, SHE EXPLAINED IT WAS DUE TO THE VICTIM'S ASIAN NATIONALITY AND THAT 'IT WOULD BE ONE LESS PERSON TO BLOW UP OUR COUNTRY.' THE VICTIM WAS HOSPITALIZED AND SURVIVED THE ATTACK. ON 20 APRIL 2023, THE PERPETRATOR WAS INDICTED ON A FEDERAL HATE CRIME CHARGE, THOUGH HER LAWYER CLAIMS SHE HAS A HISTORY OF MENTAL ILLNESS AND SAID HE WOULD BE SEEKING AN INSANITY DEFENSE.

ON 9 OCTOBER 2020, ABOUT 100 TO 150 PEOPLE RALLIED IN PHILADELPHIA (PENNSYLVANIA) AGAINST GUN VIOLENCE AND TO REMEMBER A TEEN WHO WAS RECENTLY SHOT AND KILLED IN THE AREA. DURING THE GATHERING, SOMEONE FIRED A GUN NEAR THE CROWD, RESULTING IN A STAMPEDE. IN A NEWS VIDEO OF THE INCIDENT PEOPLE ARE SEEN TRYING TO CALM A MAN WITH A GUN. ACCORDING TO POLICE THEY WERE STILL LOOKING FOR THE GUNMAN LATE IN THE NIGHT.

ON 24 FEBRUARY 2021, ABOUT A DOZEN DEMONSTRATORS INCLUDING MEMBERS OF THE KIOWA AND CHEYENNE TRIBAL GROUPS CONTINUED TO RALLY AT A CONSTRUCTION SITE IN TAOS (NEW MEXICO) AGAINST THE CONSTRUCTION OF A WATER PIPELINE ACROSS U.S. 64 AND AGAINST THE WAY THE ABEYTA WATER RIGHTS SETTLEMENT WAS IMPLEMENTED. A DRIVER WAITING TO ENTER THE SITE REVVED THE CAR ENGINE AND ALLEGEDLY SPED TOWARDS A DEMONSTRATOR, HITTING HIM IN THE KNEE AS HE JUMPED OUT OF THE WAY. THE DEMONSTRATION ENDED WHEN THE CONSTRUCTION COMPANY ERECTED CONCRETE HIGHWAY BARRIERS ON THE EASEMENT WHERE PROTESTERS WERE ENCAMPED. POLICE WERE PRESENT AND REPORTEDLY PREVENTED DEMONSTRATORS FROM REMAINING IN THE AREA WHEN THE COMPANY BEGAN ERECTING THE BARRIERS. AN ALLEGED ALTERCATION OCCURRED BETWEEN AN EL PRADO WATER AND SANITATION DISTRICT BOARD MEMBER AND DEMONSTRATORS, ALTHOUGH THE NATURE OF THE ALTERCATION REMAINS UNCLEAR.

ON 14 AUGUST 2022, A GROUP OF A DOZEN DEMONSTRATORS MARCHED IN THE HILLTOP NEIGHBORHOOD OF TACOMA (WASHINGTON) AGAINST GENTRIFICATION. A DRIVER INTENTIONALLY DROVE INTO THE PROTESTERS AND STRUCK A PROTESTER WITH HIS CAR IN THE INTERSECTION OF SOUTH 19TH STREET AND MARTIN LUTHER KING JR. WAY. THE VICTIM SUSTAINED INJURIES.

ON 30 NOVEMBER 2022, MORE THAN 50 PEOPLE MARCHED FROM THE CURTIS BAY RECREATION CENTER TO THE CSX COAL TERMINAL IN BALTIMORE (MARYLAND) TO CALL FOR AN END TO COAL EXPORTS FROM BALTIMORE. MEMBERS OF THE SOUTH BALTIMORE COMMUNITY LAND TRUST ORGANIZED THE PROTEST TO COINCIDE WITH THE FIRST ANNIVERSARY OF AN EXPLOSION OF A COAL SILO AT CSX. DURING THE DEMONSTRATION, ONE OF THE PROTESTERS WAS HIT IN THE EYE WITH A PAINTBALL WHICH CAUSED A FRACTURE OF THE EYE. THE PROTESTERS WERE UNABLE TO SEE WHO WAS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE INCIDENT.

ON 28 SEPTEMBER 2023, ABOUT 60 DEMONSTRATORS, INCLUDING MEMBERS OF RED NATION AND AT LEAST ONE MEMBER OF THE SAN ILDEFONSO PUEBLO NATIVE AMERICANS, GATHERED OUTSIDE OF RIO ARRIBA COUNTY BUILDING IN ESPANOLA (NEW MEXICO) TO DEMONSTRATE AGAINST A STATUE OF JUAN DE ONATE, A SPANISH CONQUISTADOR WHO WAS GOVERNOR OF A HISTORICAL PROVINCE THAT ENCOMPASSED MODERN NEW MEXICO, AND IN SUPPORT OF THE CONTINUED POSTPONEMENT OF THE STATUE BEING RELOCATED. AFTER A SCUFFLE BEGAN FOR AN UNCLEAR REASON, AN INDIVIDUAL WEARING A MAGA HAT WHO WAS INVOLVED IN THE SCUFFLE CLIMBED OVER A LOW WALL, THEN TURNED AND FIRED A SINGLE SHOT AT ONE OF THE RED NATION DEMONSTRATORS WITH A PISTOL, INJURING THEM. HE THEN FLED THE SCENE. POLICE ARRESTED THE SHOOTER ON CHARGES OF ATTEMPTED MURDER IN THE FIRST DEGREE AND AGGRAVATED ASSAULT. DURING THE SCUFFLE, ONE OF THE RED NATION DEMONSTRATORS APPEARED TO TRY TO PULL THE MAGA HAT OFF OF THE SHOOTER'S HEAD.

ON 25 DECEMBER 2023, A MAN STABBED TWO TEENAGE GIRLS FROM PARAGUAY AND SHOUTED 'I WANT ALL THE WHITE PEOPLE DEAD' AT TARTINERY IN THE GRAND CENTRAL DINING CONCOURSE IN NEW YORK - MANHATTAN (NEW YORK) IN AN UNPROVOKED ATTACK. ONE OF THE VICTIMS SUFFERED A COLLAPSED LUNG AFTER A STAB IN THE BACK, THE OTHER WAS STABBED IN THE THIGH AND WERE TREATED AT BELLEVUE HOSPITAL WITH NON-LIFE-THREATENING INJURIES. THE PERPETRATOR WAS CHARGED WITH HATE CRIMES. NO FATALITIES.

ON 13 APRIL 2023, A MAN STABBED TWO AFRICAN AMERICAN MEN IN PITTSBURGH (PENNSYLVANIA) BECAUSE HE WAS 'TOLD TO KILL ALL BLACK PEOPLE.' THE PERPETRATOR ALSO USED RACIAL SLURS WHILE BEING ARRESTED. THE TWO VICTIMS, WHO WERE STABBED IN THE LEG AND ARM WERE HOSPITALIZED IN STABLE CONDITION. THE PERPETRATOR WAS ARRESTED FOR ETHNIC INTIMIDATION, AGGRAVATED ASSAULT, AND POSSESSION OF A WEAPON.

ON 25 APRIL 2022, A UKRAINIAN MAN ASSAULTED A RUSSIAN-SPEAKING MAN AND STABBED HIM IN THE NECK AND FACE AT FALADA LOUNGE IN SHEEPSHEAD BAY IN NEW YORK - BROOKLYN (NEW YORK) IN AN UNPROVOKED ATTACK. THE PERPETRATOR STARTED HURLING 'PROFANITIES' AND SAYING 'YOU LOOK RUSSIAN' TO THE GROUP OF MEN, WHO LATER WERE IDENTIFIED AS UKRAINIANS, AND ASKED THEM TO PROVE THEY ARE UKRAINIANS BY TRANSLATING SEVERAL WORDS. AS THE PERPETRATOR DEEMED THE PROOF INSUFFICIENT, HE BEGAN ASSAULTING ONE OF THEM. THE VICTIM WAS TAKEN TO THE HOSPITAL AND GOT 17 STITCHES. THE PERPETRATOR IS CHARGED WITH HATE CRIME, MENACING, HARASSMENT AND CRIMINAL POSSESSION OF A WEAPON. NO FATALITIES.

source: CBS2 (LOS ANGELES); FRESNO BEE; LOS ANGELES TIMES; MY NEWS LA
notes: ON 4 NOVEMBER 2020, AT LEAST 11 PEOPLE PHYSICALLY ATTACKED EMPLOYEES AND PATRONS AND DESTROYED PROPERTY AT CAFE ISTANBUL IN BEVERLY HILLS (CALIFORNIA) WHILE MAKING PRO-ARMENIA, AND ANTI-TURKISH AND ANTI-AZERBAIJANI COMMENTS. FOUR OF FIVE VICTIMS WERE OF TURKISH DESCENT, AND MULTIPLE PEOPLE WERE INJURED. TWO ARMENIAN-AMERICANS WERE SENTENCED TO FEDERAL PRISON FOR THE ATTACK, FOR CONVICTIONS WHICH INCLUDED COUNTS OF CONSPIRACY AND HATE CRIMES.

ON 22 SEPTEMBER 2021, PEOPLE ATTACKED A BANGLADESHI JOURNALIST AT A PRESS CONFERENCE HOSTED BY US-BASED MEMBERS OF THE AWAMI LEAGUE IN NEW YORK - QUEENS (NEW YORK). THE JOURNALIST BEGAN ASKING QUESTIONS WHEN INDIVIDUALS RUSHED AND GRABBED AT THE JOURNALIST. SEVERAL JOURNALISTS TRIED TO PROTECT THE TARGETED JOURNALIST. THE JOURNALIST REPORTED HIS ASSAULT TO THE NYPD AND WAS TREATED FOR HIS INJURIES.

ON 5 MARCH 2022, A WOMA, WHO WAS BORN IN IRAN, ATTACKED A MAN SHE MET THAT DAY FROM AN ONLINE DATING WEBSITE, BY STABBING HIM IN THE NECK AT SUNSET STATION HOTEL IN HENDERSON (NEVADA). THE ATTACK WAS MOTIVATED BY 'REVENGE' FOR THE UNITED STATES'S KILLING OF IRANIAN GENERAL QASSEM SOLEIMANI IN 2020, ACCORDING TO A STATEMENT SHE MADE TO HENDERSON POLICE AFTER HER ARREST. SHE FACES MULTIPLE CHARGES INCLUDING ATTEMPTED MURDER. THE VICTIM SURVIVED, THOUGH NO OTHER INFORMATION ABOUT HIM WAS INITIALLY REPORTED.

ON 16 MAY 2022, A TAIWANESE-AMERICAN MAN ENTERED THE GENEVA PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH IN LAGUNA WOODS (CALIFORNIA), CHAINED AND GLUED THE DOORS SHUT, AND PROCEEDED TO OPEN FIRE ON CHURCH-GOERS, KILLING ONE AND INJURING 5 OTHERS. POLICE SAY THE ATTACK WAS POLITICALLY MOTIVATED, RELATED TO CHINA-TAIWAN POLITICAL TENSIONS, AND THAT THE PERPETRATOR TARGETED TAIWANESE PEOPLE. TAIWANESE MEDIA SAID THE PERPETRATOR, WHO WAS A US CITIZEN BORN IN TAIWAN, HAD TIES TO A CHINA-BACKED ORGANIZATION OPPOSED TO TAIWANESE INDEPENDENCE. POLICE SAY FOUR UNUSED MOLOTOV COCKTAILS WERE ALSO IN HIS POSSESSION. SEVERAL PEOPLE PINNED THE MAN TO THE GROUND AND WAITED FOR POLICE TO ARRIVE, AND THE SUSPECT WAS SUBSEQUENTLY ARRESTED ON CHARGES INCLUDING MURDER AND ATTEMPTED MURDER.

ON 12 AUGUST 2022, NOVELIST SALMAN RUSHDIE WAS GIVING A LECTURE AT THE CHAUTAUQUA INSTITUTION IN CHAUTAUQUA (NEW YORK) WHEN A MAN RAN ONTO THE STAGE AND STABBED HIM MULTIPLE TIMES IN THE ABDOMEN AND NECK. AFTER AUDIENCE MEMBERS AND POLICE STOPPED THE ATTACK, RUSHDIE WAS TRANSFERRED TO A HOSPITAL, WHERE HE WAS SAID TO HAVE SUFFERED SERIOUS INJURIES, INCLUDING LIVER INJURIES AND SEVERE NERVE DAMAGE IN HIS ARM, BUT WAS EXPECTED TO SURVIVE. POLICE SAID THEY ARRESTED A 24-YEAR-OLD MAN FROM NEW JERSEY AND BELIEVE HE SYMPATHIZED WITH IRAN'S ISLAMIC REVOLUTIONARY GUARD CORPS AND THE IRANIAN REGIME. RUSHDIE HAS LONG BEEN TARGETED OVER HIS 1989 NOVEL 'THE SATANIC VERSES' WHICH WAS CONSIDERED BY SOME MUSLIMS TO BE BLASPHEMOUS AND OFFENSIVE - THE SAME YEAR THE NOVEL WAS PUBLISHED, IRAN'S THEN-SUPREME LEADER AYATOLLAH RUHOLLAH KHOMEINI ISSUED A FATWA ORDERING RUSHDIE TO BE KILLED AND OFFERING A SEVERAL MILLION-DOLLAR REWARD. RUSHDIE PREVIOUSLY SURVIVED AN ASSASSINATION ATTEMPT IN 1989.

ON 9 OCTOBER 2023, AN INDIVIDUAL DROVE A VEHICLE INTO THE LOBBY OF THE CONSULATE GENERAL OF THE PEOPLE'S REPUBLIC OF CHINA IN SAN FRANCISCO (CALIFORNIA) AND YELLED 'WHERE IS CCP?' notes: ON 13 JULY 2024, A MAN SHOT FORMER PRESIDENT DONALD TRUMP IN THE EAR AT A CAMPAIGN RALLY IN BUTLER (PENNSYLVANIA), FIRING SEVERAL ADDITIONAL SHOTS INTO A CROWD GATHERED BEHIND HIM. SECRET SERVICE SNIPERS RETURNED FIRE, SHOOTING AND KILLING THE GUNMAN. ONE SPECTATOR WAS KILLED AND TWO WERE CRITICALLY INJURED AND TAKEN TO A HOSPITAL. TRUMP WAS EVACUATED FROM THE SITE, AND HIS RIGHT EAR WAS PIERCED BY A BULLET AND WAS EXAMINED AT A HOSPITAL, BUT HE SUFFERED NO ADDITIONAL INJURIES. THE GUNMAN FIRED 8 SHOTS FROM THE ROOF OF A BUILDING OUTSIDE OF THE EVENT VENUE, 150 METERS FROM THE STAGE WHERE TRUMP WAS SPEAKING, USING AN AR-STYLE RIFLE. JUST BEFORE HE BEGAN SHOOTING, A POLICE OFFICER CLIMBED UP TO HIS PERCH TO CONFRONT HIM, THEN DROPPED TO THE GROUND WHEN THE GUNMAN AIMED HIS RIFLE AT THE OFFICER. THE SHOOTING BEGAN MOMENTS LATER. BEFORE THE EVENT, LAW ENFORCEMENT HAD NOTICED THE GUNMAN PACING AND SAW HIM CLIMB ONTO THE ROOF. VIDEO FOOTAGE ALSO SHOWS THAT A GROUP OF PEOPLE GATHERED OUTSIDE THE PERIMETER OF THE RALLY ALSO NOTICED THE GUNMAN IN THE MOMENTS BEFORE HE BEGAN SHOOTING. THE FBI DID NOT IMMEDIATELY FIND ANY CLEAR IDEOLOGICAL MOTIVATION FOR THE GUNMAN'S ATTEMPTED ASSASSINATION, AND LATER INVESTIGATION SHOWED THAT HE RESEARCHED MANY EVENTS AND SAW THE TRUMP RALLY AS A 'TARGET OF OPPORTUNITY' RATHER THAN HAVING A CLEAR POLITICAL MOTIVE. ON 5 JULY 2020, A GROUP OF PEOPLE WERE SITTING BY A CANAL IN INDIANAPOLIS (INDIANA) WHEN ONE OF THEM USED A RACIAL SLUR. A SEPARATE PASSING GROUP OF PEOPLE CONFRONTED THE SITTING GROUP WHEN THEY HEARD THE SLUR. ACCORDING TO THE GROUP SITTING DOWN, THE CONFRONTING GROUP SHOUTED, 'BLACK LIVES MATTER,' TO WHICH THE OTHER GROUP RESPONDED, 'ALL LIVES MATTER.' A BRIEF ARGUMENT FOLLOWED, BUT ACCORDING TO MEMBERS OF THE GROUP THAT SHOUTED 'ALL LIVES MATTER,' BOTH SIDES SEPARATED AFTER EACH REALIZED THE OTHER HAD FIREARMS. MINUTES LATER, MEMBERS OF THE GROUP THAT SHOUTED 'ALL LIVES MATTER' SAID AN UNIDENTIFIED PERSON OPENED FIRE FROM A NEARBY BRIDGE, STRIKING A FEMALE MEMBER OF THE GROUP AND KILLING HER. HER HUSBAND RETURNED FIRE, BUT DID NOT HIT ANYONE. THE HUSBAND OF THE WOMAN WHO WAS KILLED CLAIMS THAT THE SHOT WAS FIRED BY ONE OF THE PEOPLE WHO YELLED 'BLACK LIVES MATTER,' BUT POLICE HAD NOT INDEPENDENTLY VERIFIED WHETHER THE SUPPOSED ARGUMENT OCCURRED OR IF THE FATAL SHOOTING WAS CONNECTED TO THE ARGUMENT.
